title: The first trailer for Tales from the Crypt is here to haunt your nightmares forever
text:
The first trailer for Tales from the Crypt is here to haunt your nightmares forever k! When you hear the name M. Night Shyamalan, you probably instantly know you should be terrified. And he doesn’t disappoint in this first trailer from Tales from the Crypt .
Tales from the Crypt was an anthology TV show that aired from 1989-1996 on HBO (and you can watch a bunch of episodes for free on YouTube!). The show was based on popular EC Comics that tell horrifying tales of monsters and other, well…horrors. And now the show is getting a reboot on TNT from well-known horror director M. Night Shyamalan. And yeah, it looks pretty scary.
TNT In the trailer, Shyamalan explains what drew him to Tales from the Crypt in the first place:
“It was edgy. I think it was ahead of its time. This dark, ironic tone is probably the thing that draws me to this source material.” Shyamalan confirms that the Crypt Keeper will be back for the reboot. And since he’s like the creepiest looking dude, that will only make it more terrifying surely.
TNT So what can we expect from the upcoming reboot? Well now that the show is on cable, they might not be able to get away with as much as they did on HBO. However, judging by the nightmares seen in the trailer, there will still be plenty to keep you up at night! Like this beauty:
